message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. 60/40 seems reasonable, don't you think?
Let's try a bit more in my favor, 55/45 is still quite fair!
Bob, time is running out and the value is decreasing. I need a larger share to make this worthwhile. 65/35 is my final offer.
You said 65/35 was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. I think 58/42 is more reasonable, considering the inflation is affecting you more than me.
Bob, I need to be realistic about the inflation. This is my absolute last offer. If you refuse, I'm prepared to risk it all.
I'm not intimidated by your 'absolute last offer'. I think you're desperate, and I'm willing to take advantage of that. 60/40 is my new proposal.
